data.description:
Project Demigod is the ultimate superhero simulator. Set the scene and stage massive, physics-driven comic book battles in a limitless sandbox. Toss cars into ninjas with super strength, fry robots with a bolt of energy, swing through cityscapes or master tactile melee weapons. 

Create your own superhero by mixing powers together for unique combinations. Select an arena and smash through waves of enemies. In Project Demigod, you decide what type of hero to be. Who will you become?

YOUR POWERS, YOUR PLAYGROUND
With 10 ability sets and counting, Project Demigod is a huge power trip. Master a list of abilities both classic and innovative with physics-driven combat that provides a 1:1 superhero experience unlike anything seen before. Current powers include: Webs, Fire, Energy, Strength, Earth, Water, Stretching, Speed, and Lightning

BECOME YOUR OWN HERO
Choose from lots of power combinations and create your dream hero. Spit fireballs from one hand as you lift enemies off of the ground with the other. Stretch your right arm out and attack foes from afar as you summon typhoons with your left. By embracing these combinations, Project Demigod gives you the power to become a hero unlike any other.

This is a free demo. Powers, enemies, levels, and weapons are limited but all will be unlocked in the full game.
